mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.note as note ,a.yhnote as yhnote ,a.note_time as noteTime ,a.reply as reply ,a.glreply as glreply ,a.reply_time as replyTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM Liuyanxinxi a
and a.note like CONCAT('%',#{params.note},'%')
and a.yhnote like CONCAT('%',#{params.yhnote},'%')
and a.note_time = #{params.noteTimeStart} and DATE_FORMAT(a.note_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.noteTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.note_time = #{params.noteTimeEnd} and DATE_FORMAT(a.note_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.noteTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.reply like CONCAT('%',#{params.reply},'%')
and a.glreply like CONCAT('%',#{params.glreply},'%')
and a.reply_time = #{params.replyTimeStart} and DATE_FORMAT(a.reply_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.replyTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.reply_time = #{params.replyTimeEnd} and DATE_FORMAT(a.reply_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.replyTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
order by a.id desc
